CustomField.description: Number of hours remaining to complete the project.
CustomField.formula: NAV_Hours_Total_Cx__c - Total_Hours_Assigned__c /*changed to Hours Assigned on 6/28/2021 per Ticket #31492; formerly subtracting Hours_Completed__c */
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of hours remaining to complete the project.
CustomField.label: Hours Remaining
